skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Proficient in crafting responsive and visually appealing front-end designs using React, Tailwind CSS, and modern web development technologies.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Skilled in building robust and efficient backend systems using Spring boot or Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and RESTful APIs for seamless functionality.

skills.title: DevOps
skills.description: Experienced in implementing CI/CD pipelines, managing deployments, and ensuring system reliability using tools like Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform and Ansible

skills.title: Cloud technologies
skills.description: Proficient in leveraging cloud platforms like AWS and Azure for scalable deployments, storage solutions, and serverless computing.

portfolio.title: Finance tracker
portfolio.description: Finance management system that includes income and expense tracking through journal entries, and invoice generation for customers.

portfolio.title: HR Management System
portfolio.description: Job portal with user-side vacancy search and application, and HR-side employee management, task assignment, and vacancy control.
